properties.name: nakadi-producer.scheduled-transmission-enabled
properties.description: determines, if persisted events should be automatically and periodically transmitted to nakadi

properties.name: nakadi-producer.nakadi-base-uri
properties.description: the base URI of your nakadi instance

properties.name: nakadi-producer.access-token-uri
properties.description: if you use the stups tokens library, this configures the URI of your OAuth2 server

properties.name: nakadi-producer.access-token-scopes
properties.description: if you use the stups tokens library, provide a list of oAuth scopes that are required to send nakadi events

properties.name: nakadi-producer.transmission-polling-delay
properties.description: When all existing events have been transmitted to nakadi, the sender will sleep for the specified amount of milliseconds before trying to fetch a new batch of events for transmission
